original_title: The Spanish Stallion: Zaawaadi's Power of Wild Beauty
overview: Porn legend Rocco Siffredi continues his boxing-based feature series with The Spanish Stallion: Zaawaadi's Power of Wild Beauty. Highlighting this chapter is gorgeous Zaawaadi - the naturally comely Black stunner performs in two scenes, including a double penetration threesome.
title: The Spanish Stallion: Zaawaadi's Power of Wild Beauty
